stories.title: Hotter Kalahari desert may stop hornbills breeding by 2027

stories.text:
Hey HN,

I've been thinking about this a lot lately.

If you are a solo founder/ bootstrapper, what do you do get honest feedback on your products/ideas?

Especially when you're just starting out, and have no users yet.

Who do you ask?

- Friends and family - Other founders in communities - Twitter

Anyone else?

Would love to know your approach or if something that worked for you.

Thanks
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you do to receive honest feedback for your products?

stories.text: What is your preferred platform to consume developmer oriented content? Would you recommend any other? What are other places you consume development content on?
